message: I've read a lot about the dispose pattern and these rules. It all makes good sense and it does make my job easier, but only if I am perfect enough to always call Dispose in my disposable classes. I find, however, that I want to add a finalizer and GC.SuppressFinalize in Dispose anyway because I can put logging into the finalizer to detect when I fail to properly call dispose. Is there a simpler, more elegant way to detect failure to dispose for an application in the field?
